name: Hot Wings (artifcat, DeathTost)
description:
Hot Wings

Fly, you fool! You are playing as Icarus. Your job is to keep flying and avoiding incoming pillars. Your wings are made from a wax that is easily melted by the Sun, so remember, fly close enough to the ground!

Controls:

Spacebar or Left mouse click - to fly up

Credits:

Artifcat - animations and main character controls, fancy stuff 

DeathTost - particles, main logic, other stuff :P

SlavicGameJam2020, Theme: Close Enough
